channel.title: ~! Attacking single enemy? !~ HELP QUICK PLZ!
channel.description:
right now for my vengeance im using [code] attackPlayersWithin(600, 30, 2); [/code] but i want it just to attack one person... the guy your fighting.
what do i put there?

item.title: ~! Attacking single enemy? !~ HELP QUICK PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

how are ypou guys better ranked than me… those numbers are
(int gfx, int maxDamage, int range)

if you make the 2 into a 0 it makes it so it attacks only people standing on the same suare you are…

Read full topic

item.title: ~! Attacking single enemy? !~ HELP QUICK PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

mine says : [code]
case 162: {
if (actionTimer == 0) { {
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {}
for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(2890);
txt4 = “I L1k3 $up3R M3g4 buTT $3x Pl0x!!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}

            sendMessage("You use vengence!");
            break;[/code]

whats the "17, 1); " for ? you had 30 instead of 17

item.title: ~! Attacking single enemy? !~ HELP QUICK PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

No don’t make it 1 because then if someone is next to the player your attacking they will get attacked to.

Change this code:

    					attackPlayersWithin(600, 30, 2);

To this:

    					attackPlayersWithin(600, 30, 0);

Read full topic
